Quickstrike:



There was no answer at Black Arachnia's quarters. Now he was really 
getting nervous. He couldn't find Tarantulas or Black Arachnia. He 
was getting a bad feeling.

Hatred appeared on his face. He bolted down the cooridor. Hell Beast 
could have done something to them. He haulted, the sharp ridges at 
the bottom of his feet lightly screeching. He looked around, getting 
anxious. 

He opened his comm-link to Tarantulas' and Black Arachnia's 
frequency, "Hey, where are y'all? Somebody answer." If they didn't, 
he was going to find Hell Beast.
